text: Fougerolles is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Haute-Saône department in east France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Fougerolles-Saint-Valbert.Arrêté préfectoral 25 September 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Haute-Saône
title: Fougerolles, Haute-Saône
